name: Galactic Counsellor
description:
You claim to be the best marriage counsellor in the whole world. But little did you know that saying that out loud would get you abducted. An alien dictator has abducted you in hopes that you will fix his failing marriage. However, if you fail, he will kill you and destroy Earth.  This all depends on the choices you make. Good luck human. 

Made by Space Goo Productions 
Charmaine Wong - Art 
Jordan Baltich- Coding/ Fungus Wizard 
Darryl Feniquito- Sound Design 
Team- Narrative and Concept Art
